knimeNode.name: SubmitToQueue
knimeNode.shortDescription: SubmitToQueue - submits jobs to queue instead of calculating them local

fullDescription.intro: SubmitToQueue submits jobs started by other nodes to a queue instead of calculating them on the local computer, where knime is installed. This Node does not have in- or out ports. You simply have to connect the flow variables port of SubmitToQueue to the first node of your pipeline, that you want to run on a queue. This node might be replaced by the powerful Knime server environment.
fullDescription.option: Specify the amount of memory [GB], that should be reserved per job. If this number is specified to large, the Jobs might not start.
For an easy identification of the jobs using 'qstat' you can specify a short name that is used as prefix.
